column1: straight to the tatoo shop when this coronavirus shit past

"That said, 83 people died in Florida from the coronavirus on Tuesday, the biggest spike in daily deaths since the plague started." Be afraid, aaaaah, we're all gonna die! This a plague? More people died from car crashes in #Florida than the Coronavirus.
these people already have built up anger from this coronavirus and being quarantined ... just fed up with the government period
